text: Vy mozhete nikoly ne buty rivnopravni u mayutʹ spravu z bilʹsh nizh odnu druzhynu, niyaka materiya yak tyazhki vy ne probuyete. Tomu, ne budutʹ tak uperedzhenyy shchodo vid'yizdu odnoho z nykh vishayuchoho (ni polyublyayutʹ shlyub, ni lyshav odruzhytysya z khtosʹ shche). Yakshcho vy vypravlyayete tsyu sytuatsiyu ta pidtrymuyete righteousness, BOH Forgiver, Naybilʹsh Myloserdnyy
